name: Ciprene 2811
description: Ciprene 2811 is a polychloroprene and solvents based, one-component contact adhesive. Used in the automotive and cork industry, it is indicated for coating work. Also used in the footwear industry, especially suitable for bonding glues on normal fur with high fat content. This glue has as main characteristic the strong adhesion, as well as, high resistance to temperature (ideal for jobs where prolonged periods are required in expansion furnaces).
